intro.dialog: |wave|I want to transmute a perfume of that scent.
My behavior was very     toxic    earlier, but I want to change that.
I know one way that I can make the world better.
If you have anything |C3|toxic|C0| in nature, then I want to turn it into an aromatic perfume.
|wave|Anything can be changed for the better.

intro_blank.dialog: |wave|I want to make a perfume of that scent.
I know how I can make the world a little better today.
The sweet scent in your hair has inspired me!
If you have any gifts that are |C3|toxic|C0| in nature, then I want to turn them into an aromatic perfume.

comment_trade.dialog: I will trade some of my gifts for yours.

comment_active.dialog: I want things I can transmute into perfume.

comment_quick.dialog: A lot of these make excellent ingredients.

comment_leave.dialog: I'll get to work when you go!

comment_closed.dialog: I have nothing left to give.

comment_give_limit.dialog: I think I have enough for today.

comment_take_stone.dialog: I uhh... I made this for you.

comment_take_unknown.dialog: I can't remember what this is.

comment_take_over.dialog: Do you have something else for me?

comment_quick_limit.dialog: Sadly, I can't make it any smaller for you.

gift_taken.dialog_rand2: I hope it transforms your ability to love.
gift_taken.dialog_rand3: Please use this to make the world a little better.
gift_taken.dialog_rand4: I know you will do great things with this.

comment_give_normal.dialog: I'll take this if you don't need it.

comment_give_special.dialog: I will transmute this into something fragrant!

comment_give_favorite.dialog: |wave|What a beautiful mess this is!|L||norm|I can turn it into something lovely.

comment_give_TAG_scent.dialog: What a lovely scent this has!

comment_give_TAG_chemory_part.dialog: |shake|Is that one of mine?|norm||L|Can I have it back, please?

comment_give_I_natural_glyph.dialog: That's really cute!|L||shake|Wait, is that supposed to be me?

comment_give_dislike.dialog: I can't take this.|L|Strong electric currents will mess with the transmutation process.

comment_give_quick.dialog: I'll have to transmute this quickly!

comment_give_blessing.dialog: I can use this vibe as inspiration.

comment_give_burden.dialog: This is the kind of challenge I'm looking for!

comment_give_taken.dialog: I have enough of this already.

give_confirm.dialog: Will you give this to me?

gift_given.dialog_rand1: This could be very useful to me.
gift_given.dialog_rand3: You are too nice to me.
gift_given.dialog_rand4: This could help me with my work!

special_given.dialog_rand1: I will bond the molecules into something lovely.
special_given.dialog_rand2: It's time for some chemical bonding!
special_given.dialog_rand4: I will bind the molecules with something sweet.

special_given.dialog_rand1: This has a chance to become something greater.

TAG_scent_given.dialog_rand1: This scent has inspired me to create!
TAG_scent_given.dialog_rand2: I will make a perfume out of this.
TAG_scent_given.dialog_rand3: I love this scent so much!

TAG_chemory_part_given.dialog: I can't believe how careless I was with these!
I appreciate you returning it to me.

I_natural_glyph_given.dialog: Do you think I can change myself for the better?

leave_blank.dialog: It smells so sweet, I thought it was made of string sugar.

leave_defect.dialog_rand1: Blue, you smell like sitting by a pond at sunset.
leave_defect.dialog_rand2: Blue, you smell like a stream flowing through a field of flowers.
leave_defect.dialog_rand3: Blue, you smell like a tree covered in mushrooms before the rain.
leave_defect.dialog_rand4: Blue, you smell like the shade under a tree on a sunny day with a light breeze.

leave_defect.dialog_rand1: And you have the scent of the moon rising over the forest.
leave_defect.dialog_rand2: And you emit a fragrance of a basket of sweet fruit and heart candy.
leave_defect.dialog_rand3: And you have the scent of the sunrise over a field of grass.
leave_defect.dialog_rand4: And you emit the scent of dew collecting on a day bloom in the morning.

leave_defect.dialog: How did you do that?|L||!|It's so specific!

leave_twins.dialog: My sister really likes the smell of sour fruit trees.
Is that so?|!||L|I could change my scent to that right now.
Oh wow, that smells exactly the same!
You don't have to stand over there.|!||L|You can come closer if you want.

leave_devil.dialog: What a lovely scent you have!

leave_devil.dialog_rand1: I call it    Campfire and Burnt Hair.
leave_devil.dialog_rand2: I call it    Rolling Around in the Grass for Half an Hour.
leave_devil.dialog_rand3: I call it    Lightning Burned Down a Tree I was Sleeping Under.
leave_devil.dialog_rand4: I call it    Moist Tree Bark.

leave_default.dialog: What a lovely scent you have!
